DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare the efficacy and the safety of T1210 versus Olopatadine eye drops in the topical treatment of seasonal allergic conjunctivitis.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of the Efficacy and Tolerability of T1210 and Olopatadine Hydrochloride 0.1% in the Treatment of Seasonal Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Written informed consent Conjunctivitis allergic conjunctivitis Severe ocular allergy Vernal keratoconjunctivitis
